name: BELGIAN BRAIN COUNCIL
membership: European Brain Council (www.braincouncil.eu), Conseil Français du Cerveau, Spanish Brain Council, Serbian Brain Council, Croatian Brain Council,
goal: The Belgian Brain Council (BBC) is a coordinating council formed by Belgian Universities, organisations in neurology, neurosurgery, psychiatry, basic brain research (neuroscience), patients organisations, pharmaceutical industries ans medical devices companies. It therefore represents a vast network of patients, doctors and scientists. These stakeholders make it eminently suited to work in close partnership with the Belgian Federal government, the members of the Parliament and the Belgian MEPs. The BBC was founded in 2005 and has office in Brussels.
interests: Communication, Education and training, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Main dossier BBC follows: Horizon2020, European Semester, Comorbidity and chronic diseases, FP9
